column6:
PLANET WITHOUT A HULK: PART 3 OF 4 ,2007,4
The Emerald Agent of S.H.I.E.L.D. is in for the shock of her life! And we're not talking about SHE-HULK'S super-charged battle with ZZZAX! No, this is what happens after-- when she finally realizes who blasted her cousin into space! Get ready for havoc on the Helicarrier when Jen finally learns...
"They shoot Hulks, don't they?"
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Rick Burchett | penciller (cover):Greg Horn | colorist:Dave Kemp | inker:Cliff Rathburn | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Dan Slott
